mapper.select: select project.*,(select count(*) from projectComment where projectSeq=project.seq) as commentCount from project order by seq desc

select * from (select project.*,(select count(*) from projectComment where projectSeq=project.seq) as commentCount, row_number() over (order by seq desc) as num from project) where num between #{start} and #{end}
select project.*,(select count(*) from projectApply where projectSeq=project.seq and approve in('W')) as applyCount from project where seq=#{value}
select max(seq) from project where id=#{value}
mapper.update: update project set title=#{title}, contents=#{contents}, location=#{location}, capacity=#{capacity}, startDate=#{startDate}, endDate=#{endDate}, languages=#{languages}, phone=#{phone}, email=#{email}, writer=#{writer}, writeDate=#{writeDate}, state=#{state} where seq=#{seq}
update project set viewCount=viewCount+1 where seq=#{value}
update project set state='Y' where seq=#{value}
update member set point=point+#{point} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from scrap where id=#{id} and category='project' and categorySeq=#{categorySeq}
mapper.delete: delete from scrap where id=#{id} and category='project' and categorySeq=#{categorySeq}
